Team Our Work About

The Learning Model of Life

Founded in 2024, the Learning Model of Life is a cross-college initiative of The University of Edinburgh. We are a constituent of the University's Generative AI Lab (GAIL) and are supported by EPCC, the UK's leading centre of Supercomputing and Data Science. We are actively seeking partners to join our mission, commercial or philanthropic.

For inquiries about our research and opportunities to collaborate with us please contact us at info@lml.ac.uk.

For inquiries about open positions at LML please contact us at recruitment@lml.ac.uk.
